### setup
```{r, message=F, results=F}
library(readxl)
library(jtools)
# using the "readxl" package to load the .xlsx data file
data <- read_excel("./TV.xlsx")
#View(data)
```

### Question 1
A. Estimate a quadratic regression model where the GPA of middle school children is regressed on hours and hours-squared.
```{r, message=F}
ols1 <- lm(GPA~Hours+I(Hours^2), data=data)
summary(ols1)
```

### Question 3
B. Find the optimal number of weekly hours of TV for middle school children.

```{r, message=F}
# retrieving the coefs from the last ols to use as numerics
beta1 <- coef(ols1)[2]
beta2 <- coef(ols1)[3]

# Formula to maximize GPA
max_hours <- beta1/(beta2*2) * -1
max_hours
```
